special_text:
Flash
As long as Sinzer, Seafood Surprise entered the battlefield this turn, you may activate his loyalty abilities any time you could cast an instant.
[+1]: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Its controller mills two cards.
[0]: Until end of turn, Sinzer, Seafood Surprise becomes a legendary 4/6 Crab creature with hexproof and indestructible. [i](He doesn’t lose loyalty while he’s not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-2]: Return up to one target creature to its owner’s hand. Create a 0/3 blue Crab creature token.
notes:
16%
Wroked with Mechmoose on a rework
